lab5Source
Class LadyBird

java.lang.Object
  lab5Source.LadyBird

public class LadyBird
extends java.lang.Object

The class represent the ladybird and contains how to draw it, how it turn and what happens if two ladybird collide.

turn

public boolean turn()
Turns the ladybird slightly towards the goal.

Returns:
True if the ladybird faces the goal awhich means that it is done turning.

go

public boolean go()
Makes the ladybird take one step towards the goal.

Returns:
True if the ladybird have reached the goal which means that is done going..
